items.title: NLRB撤回对蒂姆·库克反泄密邮件违反劳动法的指控 (原标题: NLRB Withdraws Claims That Tim Cook's Anti-Leak Email Violated Labor Laws)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### NLRB撤回对苹果公司蒂姆·库克反泄密邮件的指控

美国国家劳动关系委员会（NLRB）已撤回了针对苹果公司及其首席执行官蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）的大部分指控。这些指控源于库克在2021年发送给员工的一封电子邮件，该邮件被指控违反了美国劳动法。

#### 事件背景

*   **邮件发送时间**：2021年。
*   **邮件内容**：蒂姆·库克在邮件中警告员工，苹果公司正在努力查明泄露信息的人员，并明确表示此类人员不属于苹果公司。
*   **邮件起因**：这封邮件是在一次苹果公司内部会议内容被泄露之后发出的，该会议讨论了薪酬公平和居家办公等话题。

#### NLRB的最初立场

NLRB最初认为，苹果公司关于泄密的规定“倾向于干涉、限制或胁迫员工”行使他们在《国家劳动关系法》下的权利。

#### 指控的撤回

*   **撤回决定**：NLRB已决定撤回投诉中的大部分指控。
*   **撤回内容**：其中包括指控苹果公司通过施加保密规定和监控员工来违反法律的声明。

![蒂姆·库克数据隐私日](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FjFMxHP75bqzG5M7i0V_FSDiVYA=/400x0/article-new/2021/01/tim-cook-data-privacy-day.jpg?lossy)

这张图片展示了蒂姆·库克在数据隐私日的相关活动，与文章中提到的2021年反泄密邮件事件背景相关。
items.shortSummary: 美国国家劳动关系委员会（NLRB）已撤回了对苹果公司及其首席执行官蒂姆·库克的大部分指控。这些指控源于库克在2021年发送的一封反泄密邮件，该邮件警告员工泄露机密信息将导致被开除。NLRB最初认为苹果的泄密规定干涉了员工权利，但现已撤回了关于苹果违反劳动法、施加保密规定和监控员工的指控。
items.translated_title: NLRB撤回对蒂姆·库克反泄密邮件违反劳动法的指控
items.content:
The National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) is no longer targeting Apple for a 2021 email that Apple CEO Tim Cook sent to employees, reports Bloomberg. The NLRB said that it is withdrawing most of the claims in a complaint that accused Cook of violating U.S. labor law by warning employees about leaking confidential information.


Cook sent the email in 2021, stating that Apple was working to identify people who had leaked information, and that such people do not belong at Apple. Cook's email followed a leaked Apple meeting that included topics like pay equity and working from home.

The NLRB said that Apple's rules around leaks "tend to interfere with, restrain or coerce employees" from the exercise of their rights under the National Labor Relations Act.

Claims that Apple broke the law by imposing confidentiality rules and surveilling workers are being withdrawn.
Tags: NLRB, Tim Cook

items.title: 评测：iPhone 17 Pro 一周使用体验 (原标题: Review: A Week With the iPhone 17 Pro)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iPhone 17 Pro 一周使用体验评测

本评测是对苹果 iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 机型发布一周后的长期使用体验总结，由 MacRumors 视频制作人 Dan Barbera 进行。

### 设备状况与耐刮性
*   **外观保持良好：** 尽管此前有报道称 Apple Store 中的 iPhone 17 Pro 样机存在划痕问题，但 Dan 在家中无保护壳使用其银色 iPhone 17 Pro 和宇宙橙色 iPhone 17 Pro Max 一周后，设备仍保持原始状态，未出现划痕。
*   **Ceramic Shield 2 显示屏：** 苹果为 iPhone 17 Pro 机型正面采用了 Ceramic Shield 2，并声称其具有出色的抗刮擦能力。Dan 使用钥匙、硬币等常见口袋物品进行了测试，显示屏上没有出现任何划痕，这与过去 iPhone 容易被钥匙刮伤的情况形成鲜明对比。
*   **店内划痕解释：** 值得注意的是，苹果后来证实，Apple Store 中 iPhone 17 Pro 样机上的痕迹并非划痕，而是由店内 MagSafe 充电支架磨损导致的材料转移。
*   **抗反射涂层：** 显示屏据称具有抗反射涂层，但与 iPhone 16 Pro 相比，差异不明显，并非主要卖点。

### 散热管理
*   **显著改进：** iPhone 17 Pro 机型采用了更新的均热板散热系统和铝制框架，在散热方面取得了重大改进。
*   **不易发热：** 与 iPhone 16 Pro 机型不同，iPhone 17 Pro 机型在使用过程中几乎不发热。

### 电池续航
*   **续航能力提升：** 经过一周的测试，iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 的电池续航能力都有显著提升。
*   **Pro Max 表现突出：** 尤其是 iPhone 17 Pro Max，其续航时间比 iPhone 16 Pro Max 延长了数小时，但作为代价，它的机身也更重更厚。
*   **充电速度：** ChargerLAB 的测试显示，iPhone 17 Pro Max 使用苹果的 40W 至 140W 充电器时，峰值充电速度约为 36W。

### 摄像头性能
*   **前置摄像头：** 质量大幅提升，自拍效果更好，新增的广角横向自拍功能非常适合合影。
*   **长焦镜头（8倍光学变焦）：** 在光线充足的条件下，8倍变焦照片效果出色。在弱光环境下表现不如预期，但4倍变焦镜头在较差光线条件下仍能保持良好性能。

### 升级建议
*   **值得升级：** 对于仍在犹豫是否从旧款手机升级到 iPhone 17 Pro 机型的用户，评测认为这可能是一次值得的升级。主要原因在于其显著的散热改进、经过验证的抗刮擦能力以及“天壤之别”的电池续航表现。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max 经过一周使用评测，表现出色。设备在无保护壳使用下未出现划痕，苹果的 Ceramic Shield 2 显示屏抗刮擦能力强。散热系统显著改进，设备不易发热。电池续航大幅提升，尤其是 Pro Max。前置摄像头质量和长焦镜头（8倍光学变焦）在良好光线下表现优异。对于旧款手机用户，因散热、耐刮擦和电池续航的提升，iPhone 17 Pro 值得升级。
items.translated_title: 评测：iPhone 17 Pro 一周使用体验
items.content:
Apple's iPhone 17 models have been out for a week now, so we thought we'd do a longer-term review of the flagship iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max now that we've been able to spend more time with them.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

MacRumors videographer Dan Barbera has a Silver ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and a Cosmic Orange ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max, and despite a lot of concern over scratches and the state of ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models in Apple Stores, they remain in pristine condition with caseless home use. iPhones may be scratching in stores, but that appears to be less common in daily use at this point.

Apple used Ceramic Shield 2 for the front of the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models, and made some big claims about its scratch resistance. So far, the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌'s display is holding up. Dan's been testing the display with keys, coins, and other common pocket items, but there isn't a single scratch. With past iPhones, sticking a key in your pocket was a sure way to cause damage.

The display is supposed to have an anti-reflective layer, but it's hard to notice a difference compared to the iPhone 16 Pro. It's definitely a subtle change and not a major selling point.

Dan has already seen major improvements with the updated vapor chamber cooling system and aluminum frame for thermal management. Unlike the ‌iPhone 16‌ Pro models, the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models barely get warm.

There's been time for more substantial battery life testing a week in, and both the 17 Pro and Pro Max have impressive gains. The 17 Pro Max in particular can last for hours longer than the 16 Pro Max, but it's definitely heavier and thicker than before.

The front camera is a major improvement in terms of quality, and selfies look much better than before. The option to take a wider-angle landscape selfie is great for group shots. As for the new Telephoto lens that supports up to 8x optical zoom, as long as you have solid lighting, your 8x shots will look great. Low-light performance isn't as solid, but the 4x lens still performs well in poorer lighting.

If you're still on the fence about upgrading from an older phone to one of the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models, it's potentially worth it. The thermal changes make a huge difference, Apple's claims about scratch resistance seem to be true, and battery life will be night and day. If you already have an ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌, let us know what you think of it in the comments below.

items.translated_title: Beats Solo Buds、Studio Pro 和 Solo 4 现已推出独家配色
items.content:
Apple's Beats brand recently introduced new color options for several of its products, and most of the updated shades appear to be retailer exclusives.


Beats Solo Buds in a new Matte Ivory color can be purchased from Walmart in Canada, Argos in the United Kingdom, and JB Hi-Fi in Australia.


For the Beats Solo 4 on-ear headphones, the new Metallic Pink color is available from Amazon in the United States and John Lewis in the United Kingdom. The Metallic Gold version is available from Target in the United States and JB Hi-Fi in Australia, and they should also be available from Walmart in Canada although we have not been able to find a listing for them.


And finally, the Beats Studio Pro over-ear headphones are available in Sand Gray from Amazon in the United States and United Kingdom and from Best Buy in Canada. A Soft Pink color is also available from Target in the United States, Best Buy in Canada, and JB Hi-Fi in Australia. A

All of the new color options were spotted in iOS code in early September, which is around the time Apple began quietly rolling out the new shades.

The Beats Studio Pro are priced at $350 in the United States, while the Beats Solo 4 cost $200. The Solo Buds are the most affordable model available in a new color, selling for $80. You can get standard colors at most retailers, but if you want one of the new special colors, you may need to seek them out at a specific shop.

Update 7:00 pm: This article has been updated with availability for additional retailers and countries.
Tag: Beats

items.title: 苹果已知晓部分iPhone 17机型上的Apple Intelligence问题，修复即将到来 (原标题: Apple Aware of Issue With Apple Intelligence on Some iPhone 17 Models, Fix Coming)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果已知晓部分iPhone 17机型上的Apple Intelligence问题，修复即将到来

苹果公司已确认，部分iPhone 17用户在下载其新的Apple Intelligence功能时遇到问题，导致相关特性无法使用。苹果支持人员已意识到此问题，并计划在不久的将来解决。

## 问题详情

*   **受影响用户**：少数iPhone 17用户报告称无法完全下载Apple Intelligence。
*   **功能受限**：这导致Apple Intelligence的各项功能，如Genmoji、Image Playground和Writing Tools等，变得无法访问。

## 苹果的应对措施

*   **问题认知**：苹果支持人员已了解此问题，并正在计划解决此错误。
*   **修复方式**：目前尚不清楚苹果是通过服务器端调整还是需要发布iOS更新来完全解决此问题。
*   **系统更新进展**：苹果正在开发iOS 26.0.1，并且iOS 26.1测试版已向开发者和公开测试人员发布。

## 用户尝试的成功修复方法

一些遇到此问题的用户已通过以下故障排除步骤成功解决：

*   关闭蜂窝网络并连接到Wi-Fi网络。
*   更改iPhone的语言设置，然后再改回。
*   抹掉iPhone并从iCloud备份重新安装。
*   开启和关闭飞行模式。
*   更改地区设置并重置网络设置。
*   重置所有设置。

items.translated_title: 苹果已知晓部分iPhone 17机型上的Apple Intelligence问题，修复即将到来
items.content:
There is a bug that seems to be preventing some iPhone 17 users from being able to download Apple Intelligence on their new devices, but it could be fixed in the near future.


A small number of users seem to be experiencing an issue that prevents ‌Apple Intelligence‌ from fully downloading, leaving ‌Apple Intelligence‌ features like Genmoji, Image Playground, Writing Tools, and more inaccessible.

According to two affected users, Apple's support staff is aware of the issue and is planning to address the bug. It is not clear if Apple can make a server-side adjustment or if an iOS update will be needed to fully resolve the problem.

Some users who have experienced issues with ‌Apple Intelligence‌ on the ‌iPhone 17‌ have been able to solve the problem, but others say several troubleshooting steps have not worked. Here are some of the successful fixes:

  • Turning off cellular and joining a Wi-Fi network.

  • Changing the iPhone's language and then changing it back.

  • Wiping the ‌iPhone‌ and reinstalling from an iCloud backup.

  • Turning Airplane mode on and off again.

  • Changing the region and resetting network settings.

  • Resetting all settings.


Apple is already working on iOS 26.0.1, and an iOS 26.1 beta has been seeded to developers and public beta testers.

items.title: 苹果测试基于LLM的Siri，使用类似ChatGPT的应用 (原标题: Apple Testing LLM Siri With ChatGPT-Like App)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果内部测试基于LLM的Siri

苹果公司正在利用一款类似ChatGPT的内部应用程序，协助工程师测试其全面改进的Siri版本。这款应用程序专为内部测试设计，不会向公众发布。

![Finder Siri Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/cAJBnCWmBkVO025B2RPNuTjkiI4=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Finder-Siri-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 新Siri功能及测试应用特点

该应用程序用于测试苹果计划中的Siri新功能，包括：

*   **更强的上下文感知能力**：Siri将能更好地理解对话背景。
*   **跨应用操作能力**：Siri将能在应用程序内部和应用程序之间执行更多任务。
*   **深度集成个人数据**：Siri将与用户的个人数据更紧密地集成。

这款测试应用程序的设计类似于其他聊天机器人应用，具有以下特点：

*   按不同主题组织多个对话。
*   能够记住并引用过去的聊天记录。
*   支持扩展对话。

### Siri开发历程与LLM转型

苹果自iOS 18发布以来一直在开发更智能的Siri。最初，公司计划在iOS 18更新中推出“Apple Intelligence Siri”，但由于未能达到苹果的标准，该功能被推迟到2026年。

随后，苹果放弃了“Apple Intelligence Siri”计划，决定采用第二代架构全面改造Siri，从而加速了向大型语言模型（LLM）的过渡。

### 即将推出的LLM版Siri

苹果计划发布的Siri新版本将采用先进的大型语言模型，类似于ChatGPT、Claude和Gemini等AI聊天机器人。LLM版Siri将具备以下能力：

*   进行连续对话。
*   提供类似人类的回答。
*   完成更复杂的任务。

### 发布时间表与未来展望

*   **发布时间**：LLM版Siri预计在2026年初推出，很可能作为iOS 26.4更新的一部分，可能在3月发布。这将比苹果最初计划推出更新版个人助理的时间晚一年。
*   **Siri外观更新**：苹果计划在2026年底揭示Siri的新外观，赋予其更具人形的设计，可能类似于Mac的Finder图标。
*   **第三方AI合作**：苹果已与Anthropic、OpenAI和Google进行过洽谈，Siri的新版本可能由第三方公司提供支持，而非完全依赖苹果内部的AI模型。
items.shortSummary: 苹果正通过一款内部类似ChatGPT的应用测试其基于大型语言模型（LLM）的Siri，该应用仅供工程师测试Siri的上下文感知、跨应用操作及个人数据集成能力。苹果自iOS 18起致力于Siri的智能化，并已放弃原计划，转而采用第二代架构加速LLM转型。新版Siri预计2026年初随iOS 26.4更新发布，将能进行连续对话并处理复杂任务。苹果还在考虑与Anthropic、OpenAI或Google等第三方合作。
items.translated_title: 苹果测试基于LLM的Siri，使用类似ChatGPT的应用
items.content:
Apple designed a ChatGPT-like app to help its engineers test the overhauled version of Siri, reports Bloomberg. Unfortunately, the ‌Siri‌ app isn't going to be released to the public, and it's strictly for internal testing.


The app is being used to test new ‌Siri‌ features that Apple has planned, such as more contextual awareness, an ability to do more in and between apps, and deeper integration with personal data.

It is said to look similar to other chatbot apps, organized into multiple conversations across different topics. The app is able to remember and reference past chats, and it supports extended conversations.

Apple has been working on a smarter version of ‌Siri‌ since the launch of iOS 18. The company initially planned to debut an Apple Intelligence ‌Siri‌ as part of the update, but ended up delaying the functionality until 2026 because it did not meet Apple's standards.

The ‌Apple Intelligence‌ ‌Siri‌ plan was scrapped, and Apple decided to entirely overhaul ‌Siri‌ with second-generation architecture, speeding up an LLM transition. The upcoming version of ‌Siri‌ that Apple plans to release will use advanced large language models like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and other AI chatbots.

LLM ‌Siri‌ will be able to hold continuous conversations, provide human-like responses to questions, and complete more complex tasks.

Apple is on track to launch the LLM version of ‌Siri‌ in early 2026, likely as part of an iOS 26.4 update that could come in March. That will see ‌Siri‌ introduced a full year after Apple originally wanted to launch the updated version of the personal assistant.

At the end of next year, Apple is planning to unveil a new look for Siri, giving it a more humanoid design that could be similar to the Mac's Finder logo.

Apple has held talks with Anthropic, OpenAI, and Google, and it may use a third-party company to power the new version of ‌Siri‌ rather than relying on its in-house AI models.
